channel.title: Create Drafts Action with Optional Bear ID
channel.description:
Hi,
The idea is to write in Drafts with a link to a Bear.app note and then to send it say to Day One.
* Bear syntax is: bear://x-callback-url/open-note?id=
* Bear note ID is say: CD47ADAA-585E-4D74-BDB4-2B9D733087C3-16750-000051E3EC29CFFA
* Resulting link to Bear note is say: [See Bear](bear://x-callback-url/open-note?id=CD47ADAA-585E-4D74-BDB4-2B9D733087C3-16750-000051E3EC29CFFA)
So, my question : how do i build an action to be self-applied into Drafts so that: 1. Default part is : bear://x-callback-url/open-note?id= 2. Prompt to enter : [See Bear] (or any text I want to name my Bear Reference) 3. Prompt to add Bear note ID between parentheses 4. Return to current Drafts document with: [See Bear](bear://x-callback-url/open-note?id=CD47ADAA-585E-4D74-BDB4-2B9D733087C3-16750-000051E3EC29CFFA)
Hope that's clear. I'm just starting my annual subscription to Drafts 5 :smile: Thanks.
